mechanics.condition: Ground is within the 20-foot square area of effect
mechanics.outcome: Ground in the area becomes difficult terrain

mechanics.trigger: Creature is in the area when spell is cast
mechanics.condition: Creature fails a Strength saving throw against the spell
mechanics.outcome: Creature becomes Restrained by the plants until the spell ends

mechanics.condition: Creature uses its action to make a Strength check against the caster's spell save DC AND succeeds
mechanics.outcome: Creature is no longer Restrained by Entangle

description_text: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting form a point within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain. A creature in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a strength saving throw or be restrained by the entangling plants until the spell ends. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself. When the spell ends, the conjured plants wilt away.
